anya-e0803n12:229_3: Tatra “ahaṁ puriso, ahaṁ kaññā, ahaṁ citta”ntiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:230_0: Kaccāyanacūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakesu pana “tumhākaṁ amhāka”nti ca dutiyābahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:230_1: Kaccāyane “tumhānaṁ amhāna”nti ca paṭhamādutiyābahuvacanaṁ, “tumhaṁ amha”nti ca catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanaṁ, paṭhamādutiyābahuvacanañca vuttaṁ, cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭake pana “tumhaṁ amha”nti ca dutiyekavacanaṁ vuttaṁ, “tumhe amhe”ti ca catutthīchaṭṭhībahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:230_2: Etāni upaparikkhitvā sāṭṭhakathesu suttantesu dissanti ce, gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:231_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṁ pana parapadehi saddhiṁ samāse “maṁdīpā”tiādayo payogā tathāgatādimukhato sambhavanti.
anya-e0803n12:231_1: “Ete gāmaṇi maṁdīpā maṁleṇā maṁsaraṇā”ti hi tathāgatamukhato, “tayyogo mayyogo”ti niruttaññumukhato, kābyādāse ca “tvaṁmukhaṁ kamaleneva, tulyaṁ nāññena kenacī”ti ca “candena tvaṁmukhaṁ tulya”nti ca kavimukhato.
anya-e0803n12:232_0: Tattha hi ahaṁ dīpo etesanti maṁdīpā, ahaṁ leṇaṁ etesanti maṁleṇā, evaṁ maṁsaraṇā.
anya-e0803n12:232_1: Tumhena yogo tayyogo, tumhasaddena yogo iccevattho.
anya-e0803n12:232_2: Amhena yogo mayyogo, amhasaddena yogo iccevattho.
anya-e0803n12:232_5: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ “maṁdīpā”iccādidassanato “tvaṁdīpā”tiādīni kābyādāse ca “tvaṁmukha”nti dassanato tvaṁvaṇṇo, tvaṁsaro, maṁmukhaṁ, maṁvaṇṇo, maṁsaroādīni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:232_6: Tattha tvaṁ dīpo etesanti tvaṁdīpā, tumhe vā dīpā etesanti tvaṁdīpā, tava vaṇṇo tvaṁvaṇṇo.
anya-e0803n12:232_7: Mama mukhaṁ maṁmukhaṁ, amhākaṁ vā mukhaṁ maṁmukhanti nibbacanāni.
anya-e0803n12:235_0: Etthāha “kiṁ ettakameva tumhaamhasaddānaṁ rūpaṁ, udāhu aññampi atthī”ti?
anya-e0803n12:235_2: Yadi evaṁ kasmā padamālā visuṁ na vuttāti?
anya-e0803n12:236_0: “Te me vo no”ti rūpāni, parāni padato yato;
anya-e0803n12:237_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu, na tu vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e0803n12:238_0: Ettha ca mayaṁ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:238_2: Yasmā aṭṭhakathācariyā mayaṁsaddaṭṭhānepi mayāsaddo, mayāsaddaṭṭhānepi ca mayaṁsaddo icceva vadanti, tasmā mayampi tatheva vadāma.
anya-e0803n12:238_4: “Mayaṁ nissāya hemāya, jātā mandosisūpagā”ti ettha paññattiyaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:238_6: Bāhirena paccayena vinā manasāva nibbattāti manomayā.
anya-e0803n12:238_9: “Pīṭhaṁ te sovaṇṇamayaṁ uḷāra”nti ettha vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_10: Yadā hi suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇanti ayamattho, tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_12: Yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṁ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho, tadā sovaṇṇameva sovaṇṇamayanti padapūraṇamatte mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:239_0: Mesaddo “kicchena me adhigataṁ, halaṁ dāni pakāsitu”ntiādīsu karaṇe āgato.
anya-e0803n12:239_2: “Tassa me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetū”tiādīsu sampadāne, mayhanti atthoti vadanti.
anya-e0803n12:239_3: “Pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato”tiādīsu sāmiatthe, mamāti atthoti ca vadanti.
anya-e0803n12:240_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca, sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e0803n12:242_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi kate te mesaddānamatthavivaraṇe vinicchayaṁ brūma tesamadhippāyappakāsanavasena sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭanatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:242_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā temesaddānaṁ sampadānatthavasena “tuyhaṁ mayha”nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ, sāmiatthavasena pana “tava mamā”ti.
anya-e0803n12:242_2: Evaṁ yvāyaṁ tehi asaṅkarato niyamo dassito, so sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā.
anya-e0803n12:242_3: Tathā hi temesaddatthavācakā tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā tava mamasaddā ca sampadānasāmiatthesu aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:243_3: Tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena, matthakena ca brāhmaṇa, āhutiṁ paggahessāmi.
anya-e0803n12:243_6: Mayhameva dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ, mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:243_10: Tāta mayhaṁ mātu mukhaṁ aññādisaṁ, tumhākaṁ aññādisaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:243_12: Tava dīyate, tava silāghate, mama silāghate, pabbajjā mama ruccati.
anya-e0803n12:243_14: Ubho mātāpitā mamāti evaṁ aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:244_0: Cūḷaniruttiyañhi yamakamahātherena catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ anaññarūpattaṁ vuttaṁ “catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ sabbattha anaññaṁ, tatiyāpañcamīnaṁ bahuvacanañcā”ti.
anya-e0803n12:244_2: Namo te buddha vīratthū’tiādīsu tuyhaṁsaddassa vasena sampadāne, tuyhanti hi attho.
anya-e0803n12:244_3: ‘Kinte vataṁ kiṁ pana brahmacariya’ntiādīsu sāmiatthe, tavāti hi attho”tiādīni vadantā “ayuttaṁ saṁvaṇṇanaṁ saṁvaṇṇesu”ntipi, “passitabbaṁ na passiṁsū”tipi āpajjantīti?
anya-e0803n12:244_5: Tathā hi te “saddasatthampi ekadesato sāsanānukūlaṁ hotī”ti paresamanukampāya saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā sampadānatthavasena te mesaddānaṁ “tuyhaṁ mayha”nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu, sāmiatthavasena pana “tava mamā”ti.
anya-e0803n12:244_6: Saddasatthe hi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sabbathā visadisāni, sāsane pana sadisāni.
anya-e0803n12:244_7: Tasmā sāsane sāmaññena pavattāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni saddasatthe visesena pavattehi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpehi samānagatikāni katvā paresamanukampāya sampadānatthe tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo, sāmiatthe ca tava mamasaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo dassito.
anya-e0803n12:244_8: Yasmā pana paresamanukampāya ayaṁ niyamo, tasmā karuṇāyevāyaṁparādho, na aṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:244_9: Tāya eva hi tehi evaṁ saṁvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n12:245_1: nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṁ nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṁ “tava mamā”ti atthavacanena “tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena, na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā”tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattuṁ, tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṁ “tuyhaṁ mayha”nti atthavacanena “bhattaṁ tava na ruccati.
anya-e0803n12:245_2: Pabbajjā mama ruccatī”tiādīsupi sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti?
anya-e0803n12:245_3: Na sakkā, gāthāsu viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n12:245_4: Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṁ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:245_6: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī”tiādīsuyeva pana ṭhānesu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:246_0: Yadi saddanayaṁ nissāya “tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā”tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo siyā, “brāhmaṇassa piyaputtadānaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0803n12:246_1: Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī”tiādīsupi saddanayaṁ nissāya “brāhmaṇāyā”tiādinā vibhattivipallāsattho vacanīyo siyā catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpānaṁ satthe visuṁ vacanato.
anya-e0803n12:246_3: Attheva doso, yasmā dānayoge vā namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane nupalabbhanti, tasmā “brāhmaṇāyā”tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṁ doso yadidaṁ avijjamānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:246_4: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṁ sāvajjaṁ, tasmā “tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā”tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:247_0: Catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni hi anaññāni dissanti “purisassa adāsi, purisassa dhanaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi, brāhmaṇānaṁ santaka”nti.
anya-e0803n12:247_1: Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṁsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattanti, tappavatti “aggassa dātā medhāvī”tiādīhi payogehi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:247_2: “Aggassa dātā medhāvī”ti ettha hi “aggassā”ti ayaṁ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṁ paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati, tadā “aggassa ratanattayassa dātā”ti atthavasena pavattati.
anya-e0803n12:247_3: Yadā pana kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati, tadā “aggassa deyyadhammassa dātā”ti atthavasena pavattati.
anya-e0803n12:247_4: Evaṁ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n12:247_5: Tathā saddanayaṁ nissāya “sampadānavacana”nti tumhehi daḷhaṁ gahitassa mayhaṁsaddassa sāmiatthavasena paṇṇattiyaṁ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoteva.
anya-e0803n12:250_1: So hi loluppacāritāya “idampi mayhaṁ, idampi mayha”nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n12:251_1: yadi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā dhuvaṁ sampadānatthe, tava mamasaddā ca sāmiatthe bhaveyyuṁ, evaṁ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa “mayhako”ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā, antogadhasāmyatthattā pana “mamako” icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0803n12:252_0: Apicettha mayhaṁsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato, evaṁ santepi “mayhako”ti ayaṁ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva īsakaṁ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya.
anya-e0803n12:252_1: Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0803n12:252_2: Iti “mayhako”ti paṇṇattiyaṁ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṁ tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabboti siddhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:252_3: Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattānampi samānānaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya vuttappakāro niyamo dassitoti avagantabbaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:255_0: Evaṁ santepi etesaṁ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:256_0: Koci tesaṁ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṁ suṇa.
anya-e0803n12:258_0: “Tuyhaṁ mayha”ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n12:260_0: Sampadāne yahiṁ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n12:263_0: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n12:264_1: “Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:268_1: Ayañhi “gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāmā”ti ettha paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:268_2: “Mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase”tiādīsu upayoge.
anya-e0803n12:268_3: “Na no vivāho nāgehi, katapubbo kudācana”ntiādīsu karaṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_6: “Na no samaṁ atthi tathāgatenā”ti ettha avadhāraṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_7: “Abhijānāsi no tvaṁ mahārājā”tiādīsu nusaddatthe, pucchāyantipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0803n12:268_8: “Subhāsitaññeva bhāseyya, no ca dubbhāsitaṁ bhaṇe”tiādīsu paṭisedhe.
anya-e0803n12:268_9: “Na no sabhāyaṁ na karonti kiñcī”tiādīsu nipātamatte.
anya-e0803n12:272_0: Idāni sabbanāmānaṁ yathārahaṁ saṁkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:274_2: So ayaṁ te ime”tiādinā yathāpayogaṁ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:274_3: Tathā hi “yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako.
anya-e0803n12:274_4: Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
anya-e0803n12:274_5: Ayaṁ so sārathi etī”ti evamādayo vicittappayogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:281_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
